physical_appearance: "The image displays a birth certificate. At the top centre of the birth certificate, ""Colony of Singapore"" is stated and ""Certificate of Extract from Register of Births"" is stated just below. The place of birth is stated as ""Kandang Kerbau Hospital"" in black ink. At the bottom of the birth certificate
title_text: Certificate of Extract from registrar of births of Kaliappan s/o Krishnasamy at Kandang Kerbau Hospital
subject_terms_1: there is a blue stamp by the ""Passport Office Singapore 18936"" and there is another blue stamp by the ""Registrar of Births & Death Singapore"". The particulars and home address of both parents are available as well. There is a space for the father to note down his occupation but there is none for the mother." birth records birth registers births
subject_terms_2: certification Certification Registers of births, etc.  Kandang Kerbau Hospital (Singapore)
